teach2000.model.lists

Class List

  • java.lang.Object
    • teach2000.model.lists.List

  • public class List
extends java.lang.Object
    The List class embodies one list. It holds a list of Question elements and provides the necessary functions for the management.
    Author:
    Kristof Buts

      • getTitle

        public java.lang.String getTitle()
        The title consists of the two languages (to and from), separated by a hyphen.
        Returns:
        String containing the title of the List

      • getName

        Returns:

        public void addQuestion(Question v)

      • removeQuestion

        public void removeQuestion(int index)

      • getQuestion

        public Question getQuestion()
        This method is used to get a new question from the list. The questions will come in random order, until all questions have reached their maximum score. When that happens, null is returned
        Returns:
        next random question, null if all questions have reached their maximum score

      • resetQuestionScores

        public void resetQuestionScores()
        Resets the score of all questions in the list. To do when a test is fully completed.
